text: Hi. Sure, please send. I am surprised they are still offering internships though, given that I imagine everyone is working from home.
They are right next to Cinesite :slightly_smiling_face:

Oh wow well there is no guarantee I'll get in but worth a try, framestore has changed their internship to a sort of competition where a team of 4-6 students create a 30 seconds short film, if u can get a team ill definitely give it a go its open to all students.

Two of my modules are done, last two are in for next month then that's second year done, I recently got match moving back and got a first for it which I'm really happy about, that's what I made that model I showed you for, my tutor said I'm coming on really well as a vfx artist so I hope that's a sign of things to come.
I think I've adapted pretty well to working from home, still doesn't beat uni but gotta work with what I have lol.
